segments.text: I see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand out like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just polishing that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks so tidy except for the puddle spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so calm, it’s like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he doesn’t realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is going to end badly if someone doesn’t do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
